title: BASF 's planned capital expenditure by region 2020 to 2024
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of capital expenditure for 5 number of Regions.
The Share of capital expenditure is appeared to be the highest at Region Asia Pacific and lowest at Region South America Africa Middle East.
The highest Region Asia Pacific has 40.0 more Share of capital expenditure than the lowest Region South America Africa Middle East.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Share of capital expenditure in each Region on the y axis.
